content:
The cost of a 7-day retreat at The Yoga House in Ubud can vary depending on the type of accommodation, meal plan, and yoga program you choose. However, I can provide you with some general pricing information to give you an idea of what to expect.

**Accommodation Prices:**

* **Shared Room:** IDR 2,500,000 - IDR 3,500,000 (approximately USD 175 - USD 245) per person for 7 nights
* **Private Room:** IDR 4,000,000 - IDR 6,000,000 (approximately USD 280 - USD 420) per person for 7 nights
* **Villa:** IDR 8,000,000 - IDR 12,000,000 (approximately USD 560 - USD 840) per person for 7 nights
* **Bungalow:** IDR 6,000,000 - IDR 10,000,000 (approximately USD 420 - USD 700) per person for 7 nights

**Meal Plan Prices:**

* **Full-Board (3 meals/day):** IDR 1,500,000 - IDR 2,500,000 (approximately USD 105 - USD 175) per person for 7 days
* **Half-Board (2 meals/day):** IDR 1,000,000 - IDR 2,000,000 (approximately USD 70 - USD 140) per person for 7 days
* **Breakfast-Only:** IDR 500,000 - IDR 1,000,000 (approximately USD 35 - USD 70) per person for 7 days

**Yoga Program Prices:**

* **7-Day Yoga Retreat:** IDR 3,500,000 - IDR 6,000,000 (approximately USD 245 - USD 420) per person, including 2-3 yoga classes per day, meditation sessions, and workshops

**Total Cost:**

Based on these prices, the average total cost of a 7-day retreat at The Yoga House, including accommodations and meals, would be:

* **Budget-Friendly Option:** IDR 6,000,000 - IDR 9,500,000 (approximately USD 420 - USD 665) per person, including shared accommodation, full-board meals, and the 7-day yoga retreat program
* **Mid-Range Option:** IDR 9,500,000 - IDR 14,500,000 (approximately USD 665 - USD 1,015) per person, including private accommodation, half-board meals, and the 7-day yoga retreat program
* **Luxury Option:** IDR 16,000,000 - IDR 24,000,000 (approximately USD 1,120 - USD 1,680) per person, including villa or bungalow accommodation, full-board meals, and the 7-day yoga retreat program

Please note that these prices are estimates and may vary depending on the time of year, room availability, and other factors. I recommend checking The Yoga House's website or contacting them directly for the most up-to-date pricing information.
